Title: Moonclan Shootas
Legend: Moonclan Shootas gather in sizeable skulkmobs that rain black-fletched arrows upon the enemy. They pincushion their victims with sheer weight of fire, before surrounding any survivors and stabbing them viciously to death.
Intro: Each model in a Moonclan Shootas unit is armed with a Moonclan Bow and Slitta. 3 in every 20 models in the unit can replace their weapon option with a Barbed Net.

Rules.Name: Battalions
Rules.Rule: BATTALIONS: This warscroll can be used in the following warscroll battalions: • Skulkmob Horde

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: 1 model in this unit can be a Moonclan Boss. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s Moonclan Bow.

Rules.Name: Standard Bearer
Rules.Rule: STANDARD BEARER: 1 in every 20 models in this unit can be a Bad Moon Icon Bearer. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks made with missile weapons that target this unit if it includes any Bad Moon Icon Bearers.

Rules.Name: Musician
Rules.Rule: MUSICIAN: 1 in every 20 models in this unit can be a Gong Basher. Add 1 to run rolls for this unit if it includes any Gong Bashers.

Rules.Name: Netters
Rules.Fluff: Moonclan grots use throwing nets to capture Cave Squigs and entangle their foes.
Rules.Rule: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are within 1" of any friendly units that include any models armed with a Barbed Net.

Rules.Name: Loadsa Arrers
Rules.Fluff: Large mobs of Shootas can unleash dark clouds of arrows at the foe. Some of them might even hit!
Rules.Rule: Add 1 to Attacks characteristic of this unit’s Moonclan Bows while it has 10 or more models.
